Name: Elon Musk
Description: Elon Musk is a computer programmer, designer of rockets and electric cars, and entrepreneur who founded or co-founded PayPal, SpaceX and Tesla Motors.

Book1.Title: The Hitchhiker’s Guide to the Galaxy
Book1.Author: Douglas Adams
Book1.Quote: If you can properly phrase the question, then the answer is the easy part. So, to the degree that we can better understand the universe, then we can better know what questions to ask

Book2.Title: Zero to One
Book2.Author: Peter Thiel
Book2.Quote: Peter Thiel has built multiple breakthrough companies, and Zero to One shows how.

Name: Richard Branson
Description: Entrepreneur Richard Branson launched Virgin Records in 1973. Today Virgin Group holds more than 200 companies in more than 30 countries.

Book2.Title: Mao: The Unknown Story
Book2.Author: Jung Chang
Book2.Quote: A brilliant biography that smashes all of the myths that this terrible man built around himself.

Name: Bill Gates
Description: Entrepreneur Bill Gates founded the world's largest software business, Microsoft, with Paul Allen, and subsequently became one of the richest men in the world.

Book1.Title: Better Angels of Our Nature
Book1.Author: Steven Pinker
Book1.Quote: It's one of the most important books I've ever read.

Book2.Title: My Years With General Motors
Book2.Author: Alfred Sloan
Book2.Quote: This is probably the best book to read if you want to read only one book about business.

Name: Donald Trump
Description: Billionaire real estate mogul and former reality television personality Donald Trump is the 45th president of the United States.

Book1.Title: The Amateur
Book1.Author: Edward Klein
Book1.Quote: The Amateur is the best book I've read on how Barack Obama is wrecking our country. I urge everyone who cares about America to read Edward Klein's eye-opening book.

Book2.Title: Talent is Overrated
Book2.Author: Geoff Colvin
Book2.Quote: Geoff Colvin has written a fascinating study of great achievers from Mozart to Tiger Woods, and he was brilliantly highlighted the fact that great effort equals great success.

Name: Oprah Winfrey
Description: Billionaire Oprah Winfrey is best known for hosting her own internationally popular talk show from 1986 to 2011. She is also an actress, philanthropist, publisher and producer.

Book1.Title: A Return To Love
Book1.Author: Marianne Williamson
Book1.Quote: This book helped me realize that there are only two emotions, love and fear. In every relationship, you're always moving toward one or the other.

Book2.Title: The Four Agreements
Book2.Author: Don Miguel Ruiz
Book2.Quote: This book by don Miguel Ruiz, simple yet so powerful, has made a tremendous difference in how I think and act in every encounter

Name: Ellen DeGeneres
Description: With her own talk show, Ellen DeGeneres is one of America's most well-known comedians, also serving as a prominent gay/lesbian role model.

Book1.Title: The Goldfinch
Book1.Author: Donna Tartt
Book1.Quote: Love her writing. Can't put it down.

Book2.Title: The Four Agreements
Book2.Author: Don Miguel Ruiz
Book2.Quote: A great book that everyone should read.

Name: Johny Depp
Description: Johnny Depp is an actor known for his portrayal of eccentric characters in films including ‘Ed Wood,' ‘Sleepy Hollow,' ‘Charlie and the Chocolate Factory,’ and his role as Captain Jack Sparrow in the ‘Pirates of the Caribbean’ series.

Book1.Title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
Book1.Author: Hunter S. Thompson
Book1.Quote: A must for anyone and everyone... especially anyone in need of a serious excursion from their four walls.

Book2.Title: Fierce Invalids Home From Hot Climates
Book2.Author: Tom Robbins
Book2.Quote: There's certain books that I've been in love with for years that I'd love to bring to life, it's a great, great book.

Name: Emma Watson
Description: Emma Watson is best known for playing the character of Hermione Granger, one of Harry Potter's best friends in the 'Harry Potter' film franchise.

Book1.Title: How to Be a Woman
Book1.Author: Caitlin Moran
Book1.Quote: I read it on a plane from London to New York and I laughed out loud and cried so much I think the whole of my cabin, airline staff included, thought I was losing my mind.

Book2.Title: Women Who Run With Wolves
Book2.Author: Clarissa Pinkola Estes
Book2.Quote: A way for women to reconnect to the Wild Woman all women have within themselves, but have lost.

Name: Leonardo DiCaprio
Description: Oscar-winning American actor Leonardo DiCaprio has starred in such features as 'Titanic,' 'The Aviator,' 'Blood Diamond' and 'The Wolf of Wall Street.'

Book1.Title: The Great Gatsby
Book1.Author: F. Scott Fitzgerals
Book1.Quote: I like the idea of a man who came from absolutely nothing, who created himself solely from his own imagination.

Book2.Title: This Changes Everything
Book2.Author: Naomi Klein
Book2.Quote: Ultimately we’ve locked ourselves, through capitalism, into an addiction to oil that’s incredibly hard to reverse. I’m making a documentary about this.
